A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The term "bold" is quite apt to describe this movie\, though the word is not necessarily a good thing\, as is clearly evident in TLJ. With attempts at forced humour\, strange character choices\, unnecessary added side-plots\, dropped plotlines\, additional characters\, Leias Man of Steel moment\, Force texting romance scenes\, etc etc.  So many bold choices\, few of which actually produce good results.

Cons: Just... the movie itself... My god. It's like a Star Wars version of the Room. 

Pros: Some of the action scenes were pretty decent.
